text.div:
ServiceBookingStatusValues

The set of values that indicate the booking status of the arranged service.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/service-booking-status-values defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
APT AppointmentPlanned act for specific time and place
ARQ Appointment RequestRequest for Booking of an Appointment
EVN EventService actually happens or happened or is ongoing
INT IntentPlan to perform a service
PRMS PromiseAn intent to perform a service
PRP ProposalNon-mandated intent to perform an act
RQO RequestRequest or Order for a service

name: ServiceBookingStatusValues
description: The set of values that indicate the booking status of the arranged service.

concept.definition: Planned act for specific time and place
Request for Booking of an Appointment
Service actually happens or happened or is ongoing
An intent to perform a service

Request or Order for a service
